# this is the build file for project 
# it is autogenerated by the xmake build system.
# do not edit by hand.

# project
cmake_minimum_required(VERSION 3.15.0)
cmake_policy(SET CMP0091 NEW)
project(class LANGUAGES CXX C)

# target
add_executable(class "")
set_target_properties(class PROPERTIES OUTPUT_NAME "class")
set_target_properties(class PROPERTIES RUNTIME_OUTPUT_DIRECTORY "${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/linux/x86_64/release")
add_custom_command(OUTPUT output_class_4AFAD143
    COMMAND echo [  0%]: compiling.module.release npdsp_concepts
    COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E make_directory ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.objs/class/linux/x86_64/release/src
    COMMAND /usr/bin/gcc -m64 -fvisibility=hidden -fvisibility-inlines-hidden -O3 -std=c++23 -fmodules-ts -fmodule-mapper=${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/class/mapper.txt -D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0 -DNDEBUG -x c++ -c ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/npdsp_concepts.ixx -o ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.objs/class/linux/x86_64/release/src/npdsp_concepts.ixx.o
    COMMAND echo [  0%]: compiling.module.release signal_wrappers
    COMMAND ${CMAKE_COMMAND} -E make_directory ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.objs/class/linux/x86_64/release/src
    COMMAND /usr/bin/gcc -m64 -fvisibility=hidden -fvisibility-inlines-hidden -O3 -std=c++23 -fmodules-ts -fmodule-mapper=${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/class/mapper.txt -D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0 -DNDEBUG -x c++ -c ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/src/signal_wrappers.ixx -o ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.objs/class/linux/x86_64/release/src/signal_wrappers.ixx.o
    VERBATIM
)
add_custom_target(target_class_4AFAD143
    DEPENDS output_class_4AFAD143
)
add_dependencies(class target_class_4AFAD143)
target_compile_options(class PRIVATE
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-m64>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:C>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-DNDEBUG>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-fmodules-ts>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-fmodule-mapper=${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/class/mapper.txt>
    $<$<COMPILE_LANGUAGE:CXX>:-D_GLIBCXX_USE_CXX11_ABI=0>
)
set_target_properties(class PROPERTIES CXX_EXTENSIONS OFF)
target_compile_features(class PRIVATE cxx_std_23)
if(MSVC)
    target_compile_options(class PRIVATE $<$<CONFIG:Release>:-Ox -fp:fast>)
else()
    target_compile_options(class PRIVATE -O3)
endif()
if(MSVC)
else()
    target_compile_options(class PRIVATE -fvisibility=hidden)
endif()
if(MSVC)
    set_property(TARGET class PROPERTY
        MSVC_RUNTIME_LIBRARY "MultiThreaded$<$<CONFIG:Debug>:Debug>")
endif()
target_link_libraries(class PRIVATE
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.objs/class/linux/x86_64/release/src/npdsp_concepts.ixx.o
    ${CMAKE_SOURCE_DIR}/build/.objs/class/linux/x86_64/release/src/signal_wrappers.ixx.o
)
target_link_options(class PRIVATE
    -m64
)
target_sources(class PRIVATE
    src/main.cpp
)
